short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On-demand AI assistant for replying, rewriting, and summarizing highlighted text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of spending hours replying, rewriting, and summarizing highlighted text? Look no further than our on-demand AI assistant! With our powerful technology, you can save time and increase productivity by effortlessly delegating these tasks to our reliable and efficient assistant CompanionGPT. Say goodbye to the stress and frustration of tedious work and say hello to a more streamlined and effective workflow. Try our AI assistant today and experience the difference it can make for you and your team.

Current features: 
- Create contextual replies: You can generate responses that are relevant and fitting to the context of the conversation. 
- Re-write text: This feature allows you to rewrite text, enabling you to paraphrase or modify content as needed. 
- Summarize text with key insights: You can obtain concise summaries of text, including important insights. 

Additionally, when it comes to the tone of your text, you can leverage Companion-GPT's persuasive capabilities to craft compelling and influential content. 

Please note that you need to have an active license key for Companion-GPT, an email address, and an Open API key for ChatGPT to access these features.

Common usecases: 

Marketing, Sales and content creation.
